name: clipboard-utilities
title: Clipboard Utilities
description: A bunch of utilities for actions that require multiple items in the clipboard history
author: csharp

commands.name: perform-action-on-last-n-clipboard-items
commands.title: Perform Action on Last N Clipboard Items
commands.description: Performs calculations (or custom action) on the last N clipboard items.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
